donor_name: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
outputs.output_descr: This intervention is directed at core communities and respective key community leaders, LNP officers and supervisors. Seminars and training will increase capacities for joint identification and solving of community crime problems. Infrastrucutre and logistical support will enable community forums to be effective and LNP presence  of uniformed officers in rural and high crime areas provides more access to all citizens.

project_descr: Facilitating enhanced cooperation between police and civilieis in communities through community policing
